t: The Amazon Rainforest
s: April 16, 2024 - At one time Amazon River flowed westward, perhaps as part of a proto-Congo river system from the interior of present day Africa when the continents were joined as part of Gondwana. Fifteen million years ago, the Andes were formed by the collision of the South American plate with the Nazca plate.

t: TriForest DCPC38S, Vented DuoCap – TriForest Store
s: Vented DuoCap, Sterile Comes standard on both flat and baffled flasks of all sizes and can be used on most of our media and storage bottles as well. It is constructed in standard blue polypropylene with a PTFE 0.22 micron membrane that is ideal for aerobic/anaerobic cell culture.
